text: was a Japanese supercentenarian. At aged 116 years, 231 days, she was Japan's oldest living person following the death of Kane Tanaka on April 19, 2022. She was born in Yao, Osaka Prefecture, Empire of Japan on April 25, 1907. She moved into the Hakuto nursing home in Kashiwara, Osaka Prefecture, Japan in 2013. At the age of 110 in 2017, she was still able to do her makeup. She then became bedridden and could not speak as much in her nursing home in 2017 at the age of 110. She died on December 12, 2023 at 9:25 AM from respiratory failure in Kashiwara, Japan at the age of 116.国内最高齢の女性 巽フサさんが亡くなる…116歳 今年9月には吉村知事からお祝い状も ==References== Category:1907 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Japanese supercentenarians Category:People from Osaka Prefecture Category:Deaths from respiratory failure
title: Fusa Tatsumi
